name: HH_EPSD_HC_DIRECTN
description: This table contains home care directions for Home Health episodes. This information can be entered by the user as part of the Intake encounter or in the Address Book task on the Remote Client.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: HOME_CARE_DIR
columns.description: Directions typed in by a user for the episode.
